tasks.label: removing extensions
tasks.command: cpp -P -E ./.vscode/my-extensions.json | jq -r '.uninstall[]' | while read i; do code --force --uninstall-extension $i >/dev/null; done

tasks.label: installing extensions
tasks.command: cpp -P -E ./.vscode/my-extensions.json | jq -r '.install[]' | while read i; do code --force --install-extension $i >/dev/null; done
